Subject: Regular IGL - Epyon VS Bruiser 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Epyon::

He slowly walked out, towards his opponent. His face showing no emotion. 

He drew his beam saber, and via the thrusters in his wings, began to
spin towards Bruiser, off the ground. When in range he swung the saber
at Bruiser's neck.
